item.title: 新西兰混凝土产量在经济降温中创下新低
item.description: 由于经济增长降温和全球不确定性抑制了住宅建设和新建商业建筑的投资，新西兰的混凝土产量下滑至十多年来的最低水平。【原文：New Zealand’s concrete production slipped to the lowest level in more than 10 years as cooling economic growth and global uncertainty curb home construction and investment in new commercial buildings.】

item.title: 中国铜制造商不太可能成为特朗普关税的赢家
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）努力提高美国的铜产量，中国最大的铜加工企业之一将从中获得意外之财。【原文：One of China’s biggest copper fabricators is set to reap a windfall from President Donald Trump’s efforts to boost US production of the metal.】

item.title: 全球贸易前景改善，日本日经指数创历史新高
item.description: 由于对全球贸易的乐观情绪提振了这一蓝筹股指数，日本日经 225 指数周二创下历史新高。【原文：Japan’s Nikkei 225 Stock Average hit an all-time high on Tuesday as optimism over global trade boosted the blue-chip gauge.】

item.title: 新加坡上调 2025 年经济增长预期，但警告未来存在风险
item.description: 新加坡上调了今年的经济增长预期，因为上半年的经济表现好于预期，主要原因是在美国征收关税之前的前置性投资，以及贸易紧张局势的缓解。【原文：Singapore raised its growth forecast for this year after a better-than-expected performance in the first half, mainly on the back of front-loading ahead of US tariffs, and easing trade tensions.】

item.title: 交易员寻求澄清特朗普的无关税誓言，黄金收跌
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，进口金银不会被征收美国关税，尽管交易商仍在等待该政策的正式澄清，但上周的联邦裁决给整个市场带来了混乱和困惑。【原文：Gold held a loss after President Donald Trump said imports of bullion won’t be subject to US tariffs, although traders were still waiting for formal clarification over the policy following a federal ruling last week that sowed chaos and confusion across the market.】

item.title: 特朗普延长对华期限，石油价格维持在两个月低点附近
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普延长了对中国征收天价关税的暂停期，稳定了世界两大经济体之间的贸易关系，此后，石油价格变化不大。【原文：Oil was little changed after President Donald Trump extended a pause of sky-high tariffs on China, stabilizing trade ties between the world’s two biggest economies.】

item.title: 精神航空面临资金紧张，发布持续经营警告
item.description: 精神航空公司警告投资者，如果不能迅速筹集到足够的现金来满足债权人的要求，它可能无法作为一家持续经营的企业生存下去。【原文：Spirit Airlines warned investors it may not survive as a going concern if it can’t raise cash quickly enough to satisfy creditors.】

item.title: 美国通胀前亚洲股市低迷：市场综述
item.description: 在一份可能影响美联储加息路径的关键通胀报告公布之前，华尔街的风险厌恶情绪拖累亚洲股市开盘低迷。【原文：Asian stocks were poised for a subdued open, weighed down by a risk-off mood on Wall Street ahead of a key inflation report likely to shape the Federal Reserve’s path on interest rates.】

item.title: 资产膨胀，日本政府养老金投资基金正在招兵买马
item.description: 日本政府养老金投资基金是世界上最大的退休基金之一，随着其监管资产的膨胀，该基金即将增加其规模异常小的工作人员。【原文：Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund, one of the world’s largest retirement funds, is about to increase its unusually small staff as the assets it oversees balloon.】

item.title: 阿根廷比索债务收益率在关键拍卖前飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 周一，阿根廷政府短期债券的收益率飙升至历史新高，而就在两天前，阿根廷国库还将进行一次拍卖，这将有助于在 10 月份关键的中期选举前衡量投资者的偏好。【原文：Yields on the Argentine government’s short-term notes soared to record highs Monday, just two days before the Treasury faces an auction that will help gauge investor appetite ahead of crucial midterm elections in October.】

item.title: 辛克莱考虑出售电视台和其他企业
item.description: 美国最大的电视台所有者之一辛克莱公司（Sinclair Inc.【原文：Sinclair Inc., one of the largest TV station owners in the US, has begun a strategic review that could result in sale or breakup of the company.】

item.title: Quest 数月内第二次调整债务，创造 "3.5 级 "贷款
item.description: Clearlake Capital 集团支持的 Quest 软件公司在三个月内第二次调整了债权人的偿债顺序，因为该公司启动了另一项债务交换，以减轻债务负担。【原文：Clearlake Capital Group-backed Quest Software is shuffling the order that its creditors get repaid for the second time in three months as it launches another debt exchange to lessen its debt load.】

item.title: 电厂关闭后电网运营商下令巴尔的摩停电
item.description: 美国最大的电网运营商已下令采取紧急行动，在变电站故障迫使一家大型燃煤发电厂脱网后，减少巴尔的摩地区的电力使用。【原文：The largest US grid operator has ordered emergency action to curtail power use in the Baltimore area after a substation failure forced a large coal-fired power plant to trip offline.】

item.title: 默克集团计划出售 40 亿美元债券，为收购 SpringWorks Therapeutics 提供资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德国药品和电子产品制造商默克公司正在寻求出售约 40 亿美元的美国投资级债券，以帮助其为收购 SpringWorks Therapeutics Inc.【原文：Merck KGaA, a German maker of drugs and electronics, is looking to sell around $4 billion of US investment-grade bonds to help fund its acquisition of SpringWorks Therapeutics Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 比特币矿商 MARA 据称接近以 1.68 亿美元收购 EDF 部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，MARA控股公司正在与法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）就收购Exaion公司多数股权进行深入谈判，因为这家最大的比特币矿商希望作为基础设施供应商将业务范围扩展到人工智能领域。【原文：MARA Holdings Inc. is in advanced talks to acquire a majority stake in Exaion from Electricite de France SA as the largest Bitcoin miner looks to extend its reach into artificial intelligence as an infrastructure provider, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 杜权可能在美国 400 亿美元 Terraform 倒闭案中认罪
item.description: Terraform Labs Pte. 联合创始人 Do Kwon 可能会在美国一起刑事欺诈案中认罪，该案与 2022 年 TerraUSD 稳定币价值 400 亿美元的崩盘有关。【原文：Terraform Labs Pte. co-founder Do Kwon may plead guilty in a US criminal fraud case tied to the $40 billion collapse of the TerraUSD stablecoin in 2022.】

item.title: CoreWeave、Circle 首次公开募股后的崛起为盈利设定了高标准
item.description: CoreWeave 公司和 Circle Internet Group 公司的首次公开募股成为股市最热门的两个主题。这两家公司很快将公布季度收益报告，成为显微镜下的焦点。【原文：Two of the stock market’s hottest themes put the initial public offerings of CoreWeave Inc. and Circle Internet Group Inc. in the spotlight. They’ll soon be under the microscope when they report quarterly earnings.】

item.title: 业界称加拿大木材援助加剧了美国的补贴指控
item.description: 美国木材行业表示，加拿大承诺向国内林业公司提供的新财政支持有可能加深两国之间长期存在的贸易争端，并可能导致更多的进口税。【原文：The US lumber industry says new financial support pledged by Canada to domestic forestry companies risks deepening the neighbors’ long-running trade dispute, and may result in yet more import taxes.】

item.title: 票务平台 StubHub 更新首次公开募股文件，收入增加
item.description: 门票销售平台 StubHub Holdings Inc. 更新了其首次公开募股的申报材料，显示亏损和收入不断增加，表明该公司可能会加入一波推迟上市的美国公司重返市场的浪潮。【原文：Ticket selling platform StubHub Holdings Inc. updated its filing for its initial public offering to show increasing losses and revenue, indicating that it could join a wave of delayed US offerings returning to the market.】

item.title: 特朗普将对华关税休战延长 90 天，避免加征关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将对中国商品征收天价关税的暂停期延长了 90 天，从而稳定了世界两大经济体之间的贸易关系。【原文：President Donald Trump extended a pause of sky-high tariffs on Chinese goods for another 90 days, stabilizing trade ties between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 肯尼亚与阿提哈德铁路公司洽谈，计划筹资 40 亿美元扩建铁路线
item.description: 肯尼亚计划通过将进口税证券化来筹集多达 40 亿美元的资金，用于资助中国建造的铁路的扩建，并正在与阿提哈德铁路公司（Etihad Rail）洽谈在该铁路线上运营货运业务。【原文：Kenya plans to raise as much as $4 billion by securitizing an import levy to fund the extension of a China-built railway, and is in talks with Etihad Rail to run freight operations on the line.】

item.title: 美联储主席人选扩大至鲍曼、杰斐逊和洛根
item.description: 据两位政府官员透露，美联储的两位副主席米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）和菲利普-杰斐逊（Philip Jefferson）以及达拉斯联储主席洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）正在考虑在明年央行主席职位空缺时担任该职。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s two vice chairs, Michelle Bowman and Philip Jefferson, and Dallas Fed President Lorie Logan are under consideration to serve as chair of the central bank when the position opens next year, according to two administration officials.】

item.title: 在债务和养老金方面取得进展后，新泽西州获得 S&P 评级升级
item.description: S&P全球评级公司周一将新泽西州的信用评级从A上调至A+，这是该公司自2023年以来首次上调新泽西州的信用评级。【原文：S&P Global Ratings raised New Jersey’s credit rating on Monday to A+ from A, giving the state the firm’s first upgrade since 2023.】

item.title: 法国银行称工业将推动季度经济稳步增长
item.description: 法国央行周一在其月度商业调查报告中称，在制造业和服务业的推动下，法国第三季度的经济增长速度将与前三个月相近。【原文：France’s economy is set to grow in the third quarter at a pace similar to the previous three months, driven by manufacturing and services, the country’s central bank said Monday in its monthly business survey.】

item.title: 特朗普称不会对黄金进口征收关税，为市场提供缓和剂
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统周一表示，进口黄金将不会面临美国的关税，这是在一项联邦裁决引发全球金银市场混乱之后做出的权衡。【原文：President Donald Trump said Monday imports of gold will not face US tariffs, weighing in after a federal ruling caused chaos and confusion in global bullion markets.】

item.title: 中国矿山许可证到期后关闭，锂股大涨
item.description: 北美锂生产商的股价飙升，因为投资者押注中国一家大型矿山的停产将缓解供应过剩，并可能导致价格反弹。【原文：Shares of North American lithium producers soared as investors bet that the suspension of a major Chinese mine would ease a supply glut and likely lead to a rebound in prices.】

item.title: 瑞银股东通过高盛出让 6.19 亿美元股份
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的一位身份不明的机构股东利用该银行近期股价反弹的机会，出让其在这家瑞士贷款机构的全部股份，价值约 5.03 亿瑞士法郎（约合 6.19 亿美元）。【原文：An unidentified institutional UBS Group AG shareholder is offering its entire stake in the Swiss lender worth around 503 million Swiss francs ($619 million), taking advantage of a recent rally in the banks shares.】

item.title: 航空主题特许学校在债券出售两年后关闭
item.description: 科罗拉多天空学院（Colorado Skies Academy）是位于丹佛市外的一所航空主题特许学校，在出售未评级市政债券两年后突然关闭。【原文：Colorado Skies Academy, an aviation-themed charter school located outside of Denver, has abruptly closed two years after selling unrated municipal bonds.】

item.title: 巴西总统哈达德称与斯科特-贝森特的会晤被取消
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周一在接受当地电视台采访时表示，原计划与美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）的会晤被取消，目前没有新的会晤日期。【原文：Brazil Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said in a local television interview on Monday that a planned meeting with US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent was canceled and there’s no new date for the encounter.】

item.title: 特朗普对英伟达向中国出售缩小规模的黑韦尔芯片持开放态度
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一表示，他对允许英伟达公司向中国出售其最先进的人工智能芯片的缩减版持开放态度。【原文：US President Donald Trump signaled on Monday that he’d be open to allowing Nvidia Corp. to sell a scaled-back version of its most advanced AI chip to China.】
